import React from 'react' import Header from '../../components/Header'; const Maternity = () => { return (

File No. Ac1/28504/2021/MD H.A.

1. Please see letter dated 03.11.2023, (received on 04.11.23) from Dr. Geetha 2nd year PG in MD (Hospital Administration), requested to sanction of maternity leave from 06.11.2023 to 03.05.2024 (180 days). Medical Certificate enclosed. The letter was forwarded by HOD. Hospital Administration.
2. Dr. Gadapa Geetha, Student ID.No.28505, 2nd year PG student joined MD (Hospital Administration) 3 years course on 28.03.2022 and will be completed on 27.03.2025.
3. As per Prospectus for Admission in to Post Graduate Medical Specialty Course of MD/MS for the year 2021-22, Rule-IX sub clause-ii, Maternity Leave â€“ Women students can avail maternity leave up to maximum of 180 days once in their period of study. The study period, however, will be extended to the extent of maternity leave availed. Payment of stipend shall be limited to 36 months including the period of maternity leave availed. No stipend is payable for the extended period of training. The candidate shall be eligible to appear in the Institute examination only upon attainment of eligibility as per MCI Regulations (80% of attendance).
4. In view of the above, Maternity leave may be sanctioned from 06.11.2023 to 03.05.2024 (180 days) without stipend.
5. The study period will be extended to the extent on above leave availed. The study period will be extended up to 23.09.2025. (Provisional)
6. Submitted for perusal and approval.

) } export default Maternity
